title: About Me
text: Hello there! I am Manoharsha Sappa, born on September 26, 2000. Initiating my educational journey at Kendriya Vidyalaya for schooling, I proceeded to intermediate studies at Sri Chaitanya Junior College. Having obtained a B.Tech degree from Gudlavalleru Engineering College, I am currently immersed in the Master of Science in Data Analytics Engineering program at George Mason University in Fairfax, VA, USA, with an anticipated graduation date in May 2026. My academic journey shows that I’m dedicated and determined in the fields of data analytics and engineering.

title: Work Experience
text:
Data Science Internship | Corizo EduTech Private Limited:
During my internship, I worked on advanced data visualization for automotive datasets. I utilized Jupyter Notebook, applying Python skills with pandas, numpy, and seaborn for effective data manipulation and visualization tasks.


Interests and Domain:
My interests span across Data Analysis, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Knowledge Graph, and Time Series Analysis.

title: Projects
text:
Detecting Building Defects | Python, IBM Cloud :

Awarded the BEST PAPER AWARD at the Second International Conference on Computational and Intelligent Techniques for Automation of Engineering Systems (CITAES’22).
Developed a building defect detection system using Vgg16 architecture in Python, integrated with IBM Cloud for efficient analysis and processing of images.
Files here

Implementation and Analysis Parallel Prefix Adders | Xilinx ISE

Conducted an analysis to identify the most efficient and fastest address in real-time applications.
Files here

Automatic Engineer Locking System | GSM Module

Implemented a safety feature that halts the engine automatically if the driver consumes alcohol, enhancing road safety measures.
Files here
